title: Bachelor of Science in History Education
description: The History Education degree will prepare you and certify you in the state of Georgia to teach social studies in grades 6-12. After being certified in history, you can add on additional teaching fields simply by passing additional Georgia Assessments for the Certification of Educators (GACE) exams.
careers: Middle/High School History Teacher, Community College History Lecturer, Government Historian, Museum Curator, Lawyer, Journalist
